MobilitySummary.title: A modern device for every team’s needs
MobilitySummary.content: People aren’t just using one device anymore. They’re selecting the right device for their needs and for any given moment. How your employees work is as important as what they’re doing. They need seamless transitions from one workspace to another, from one device to another, and from working individually to working in a group. Innovative, premium devices like Surface can increase productivity, inspire ideas, accelerate progress, and serve as a catalyst to transform the way your team works. Whether you’re a graphic designer sketching a new prototype at your desk or a traveling salesperson working on the go, your device experiences should conform to your needs, not the other way around.

AssessmentSummary.title: How the Modern Device Assessment works
AssessmentSummary.content: Like our devices, the Modern Device Assessment is focused on the user. The assessment helps you bring together the relevant scenarios and technology capabilities for a selected team member, asks you to select your current maturity levels for the specified capabilities, and then generates your modern device score and device recommendation.

ResultsSummary.title: What you'll learn
ResultsSummary.content: The Modern Device Assessment will determine which technology capabilities are most relevant for your team, how your team ranks for each capability, and how your team ranks in the overall modern device journey. In addition to getting these rankings, you’ll see which Surface device is best suited to help your team modernize effectiveness.
